Here i am being forced to play this game with my friends and now you want me to double purchase this game. PEPE hands RiP and Rob is lame
В целом игра не плохая но не доработанная маньяк достигает в метре от тебя , ни какой тех поддержки
no le tenia fe y ahora toy viciao :) 10 / 10

the survivor haiku:

killer comes to gen
Dead Hard into a brick wall
one-hook sacrifice
this game will soon surpass cyber punk in number of bugs apart from having the worst matchmaking I have ever seen.
为什么突然间需要再次购买 之前买过了 卸载后重新安装发现没法安 只有存在库中的提示 怎么回事啊
interface needs a lot of work
its fun I liked it being the killer. the survivors are fun but hacking and slashing survivors is better.
jogo ruim recomendo muito to viciado absolutamente incrivel apesar de ser uma merda é um jogo foda
it's scary but not that scary. You have to have your own strategy when escaping. You are not alone
I am a rank 13 killer going against 3 red ranks and vice versa. Also my friend bought the game, played 5 hours of it, didn't refund it, and it told him to purchase the game again??????????
Its great a little bugged though.
che loco que onda lo tengo comprado y no me deja meterme que verga este steam
需要重新购买是什么意思？？？？
很是刺激，游戏氛围比较恐怖。
Bom, a cada dia o desenvolvimento do game melhora. Mas o Fps e certos mapas andam bem ruins ainda. E a caixa de hit (Hit Box) ainda se mantem duvidosa. De resto está ok.
jogo bugado sumiu da minha biblioteca e agr não consigo jogar
es ingenioso y realmente da miedo si sos un sobreviviente
for some reason i cant play my game it brings me to the steam forum

Fun with friends, I've played pretty consistently but now steam isn't letting me play it. Instead of giving me an option to play steam wants me to purchase the game again. Reviewing the game because I'm hoping this will either fix the bug or get someones attention.
缺點就是遇到守屍很討厭

Fascinante, una gran experiencia tanto como killer que como superviviente, en mi preferencia disfruto más el rol de killer en el cual me encuentro con supervivientes que hacen muy buen trabajo en equipo, escapan y con suerte logro sacrificar a uno. A la vez también me encuentro con algunos supervivientes dispersos, sin estrategia conjunta que lo que más hacen es lloriquear tras haber perdido la partida. No me parece desbalanceado el juego a estas alturas. Recomendable
Hmmmm, no aparece en mi biblioteca.
There aint no bug in this game there's a game in this bug.

Comprei o jogo, instalei, joguei e tudo estava funcionando normal. 
Mas hoje fui jogar de novo e ele dava opção de "COMPRAR" onde deveria estar "JOGAR".
Aconteceu com mais alguém?
I think they did a pretty good job so far
Porque no puedo jugar, si lo eh comprado el 3 de julio y ahora me sale para comprarlo denuevo? wtf
